pr_title: Set the default log file pattern to use the path from the data-path.

timeline.message:
Set the default log file pattern to use the path from the data-path.

fixes #3360

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: So, turns out this should have taken into account whether it was the validator or not too.  Result should be the same as the default log file but with _%d{yyyy-MM-dd} inserted before the .log extension.
